text: Ahmed Muztaba Zamal is a Bangladeshi film critic. He is editor of Celluloid, a film magazine. He directs the Dhaka International Film Festival. Zamal was a member of the International Federation of Film Critics (FIPRESCI) independent jury at the Berlin International Film Festival in 1998 and 2018; at the Cannes Film Festival in 2002, 2005, and 2009; and at the Venice Film Festival in 2007. == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Movie critics Category:Bangladeshi writers
title: Ahmed Mustafa Zamal
